overview: Tony Moses is a 25-year veteran of the ophthalmic industry, having served in various marketing and sales management positions at major device companies including Storz Instrument Company, IRIDEX, and Carl Zeiss Meditec, Inc. Most recently, he was Group Product Director, Retina for Carl Zeiss Meditec, where he managed the global strategic marketing of a $150 million business unit that included optical coherence tomography, the companyâ€™s flagship product line. Tony is well versed in all phases of the product life cycleâ€”from product development through obsolescenceâ€”and brings to NeoVista a deep understanding of both consumables and capital equipment.
